A formal expression of gratitude, typically appearing at the end of a published work, listing individuals, organizations, or institutions that have contributed to the research or project in a non-credited or credited capacity.

A method of identifying or categorizing organisms based on a specific sequence of their genetic material, used to correct errors or inaccuracies in the identification of a particular species in a research study.
A formal expression of gratitude and recognition for assistance or support provided in the development of research, often appearing at the end of a published study.
